attributes.description: The Iconic Land Rover Defender Is One Of The Most Globally Recognised Vehicles In The World Today. With Excellent Off Road Capabilities This Super Vehicle Won't Leave You In The Lurch. Our 2010 Model Is Presented In White With A Black Cloth Interior. It Has Covered 176 000 km And Retains A Full Service History, All Books And Spare Keys. Features Include A 6 Speed Manual Gearbox, Dual Battery, Water Tank, Bullbar, Winch, Snorkel, Towbar And Jack. Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.
attributes.title: 2010 Land Rover Defender 110 Puma Station Wagon
